fields.name: ContentType
fields.description: Specifies a registered or custom content type for this representation, e.g. application/xml.

fields.name: FormParameters
fields.description: Collection of form parameters. Required if 'contentType' value is either 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' or 'multipart/form-data'..

fields.name: SchemaId
fields.description: Schema identifier. Applicable only if 'contentType' value is neither 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' nor 'multipart/form-data'.

fields.name: TypeName
fields.description: Type name defined by the schema. Applicable only if 'contentType' value is neither 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' nor 'multipart/form-data'.
